user.name: brolinskeep
user.about: april 2015: for unknown reasons some of the background pics in my themes have been deleted or whatever. im trying to fix it, so if you notice a bg pic missing, please let me know on my tumblr :) if you have any questions/problems with one of my themes, please contact me on my tumblr
